name: Corn Salsa
keywords: sweet corn, corn salsa, fresh salsa, mexican side dish, taco topping, burrito filler, vegan dip, gluten-free appetizer, vegetarian recipe, easy corn salsa, homemade salsa, healthy snack, cilantro lime corn, jalapeno corn dip, no-cook recipe, summer side dish, party food, tex-mex garnish, dairy-free salsa, raw vegetable salad, quick appetizer, pico de gallo with corn
description: A fresh, vibrant, and easy-to-make Corn Salsa perfect for any Mexican feast. Featuring sweet corn, diced tomatoes, crisp onions, and spicy jalapenos tossed in zesty lime juice and coriander. This naturally vegan and gluten-free side dish is ready in just 15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Dice ingredients and mix together with the lime juice. Season to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Dice

notes: Add or remove tomato/corn as desired for whatever ratio you prefer.
Also goes well with avocado added.
Great with other Mexican food such as burritos or tacos. Can also be had alone.
